game.name: UNI
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 둘이서 즐길 수 있는 모든 장르의 게임이 하나로! 두 사람의, 두 사람에 의한, 두 사람을 위한 파티게임 UNI
game.shortDescriptionEn: This consists of 40 mini-games that you can enjoy together. You can have a happy time with your friends and family. However, sometimes you may have to prepare for the destruction of friendship.

reviewHighlights.text: One review I read; "[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/rereqkommi/recommended/1011300/]flash games with... a price[/url]" Truer words were never spoke...
I do not recommend, even with sales. There are better options on your phone for this.
